product_name: Rossignol Evo Tour Cross-Country Skis with NIS Bindings
long_description: The Rossignol Evo Tour cross-country skis with NIS bindings are easy-to-use, waxless touring skis designed for recreational skiers who want lots of surface grip. Waxless Positrack bases have a positive (raised pattern) kick surface for maximum grip and deliver the best compromise between grip and glide in all snow conditions. SKis include NIS T4 Auto bindings: easy hands-free click-in/click-out design provides fast, user-friendly entry and exit; wide heel pieces increase stability. Thin core profile lightens the skis and delivers a soft, user-friendly flex at the tip and tail. Durable Active Cap construction, with slightly widened edges, increases torsional stability and offers a supple longitudinal flex. Shorter-than-traditional ski length increases maneuverability, predictability and control while climbing, descending and cruising the flats. Stone finished bases on the Rossignol Evo Tour skis optimize the glide phase.
short_description: The Rossignol Evo Tour cross-country skis with NIS bindings are easy-to-use, waxless touring skis designed for recreational skiers who want lots of surface grip.
